section.title: Hotkeys
section.p: Some functions are only available when running in debug mode.

tr.td: Activates skip mode, but with the opposite "skip unread" setting.
Full restart. Returns to the titlescreen and reloads all scripts. Can be used to test script changes without closing the NVList window.
Starts/stops the built-in video capture. Video capture requires an x264 executable to be in your PATH.
Clears the texture cache and disposes all OpenGL resources.
F12 toggles the texture viewer. When the texture viewer is active, F11 zooms in on the texture under the mouse cursor.

section.title: Proofreader Tools
section.p: Enabling the vn.enableProofreaderTools preference adds a report bug/typo button to the menu bar of the main window. Reports made through this interface automatically include interesting information like the current script file/line and the current text in the main text box. The information provided is appended to save/bugreport.log. Bug reports created in this way are detailed and in a standardized format.
